Gave_Teachings_To: 11th Pema Lingpa, Kunzang Pema Rinchen Namgyal

Name_English: 11th Pema Lingpa, Kunzang Pema Rinchen Namgyal

Gave_Teachings_To: Khenchen Chabdal Lhundrup; Khedrup Delek Gyatso

kunzang mingyur paldron; gyalse rinchen namgyal; lotsawa chopal hgyatso (lochen dharma shri); rikse choktrul pema gyurme gyatso; katokpa gyalse rinpoche sonam detsen; 2nd dzogchen rinpoche, gyurme tekchok tendzin
ngak rabjampa orgyen chodrak; khenchen oddiyana
ngakyi rabjampa orgyen palgon (drupwant shrinatha); jetsunma trinle chodron
jigme kundrol namgyal; jigme gyalwai nyugu; getse jigme nogtsar tendzin; 1st dodrupchen jigme trinle ozer

Received_Teachings_From: kyabgon pema gyatso; chonyon dharma seng-ge
Gave_Teachings_To: zhadeu trulzhik chenpo ngawang chokyi lodro

Incarnation_Of: gemang gyalse rigpai dorje (gyalse zhenpen taye ozer)

Gave_Teachings_To: 2nd Dodrupchen, jigme puntsok jungne; chogyal ngagi wangpo; trehorpa kyabgon yeshe gyaltsen; do khyentse yeshe dorje; 4th dzogchen rinpoche, Mingyur Namkhai dorje; gemang gyalse rigpai dorje; choying tobden dorje; choklung repa damtsik dorje
